meanings.definition: The leader or chief of a group or movement.
meanings.sent1: The coryphaeus of the team guided us to victory.
meanings.sent2: The coryphaeus of the orchestra conducted with great passion.
meanings.sent3: The coryphaeus of the book club always picked mystery novels for us to read.
meanings.sent4: She was the coryphaeus of the dance floor, moving with grace and confidence.
meanings.sent5: In the jungle of ideas, he stood out as the coryphaeus, leading others with his innovative thinking.

meanings.definition: A prominent or influential figure in a particular field or activity.
meanings.sent1: As a coryphaeus in the art world, her paintings were highly sought after.
meanings.sent2: The scientist was a coryphaeus in the field of genetics, revolutionizing research.
meanings.sent3: The coryphaeus of the fashion industry always set new trends effortlessly.
meanings.sent4: He became a coryphaeus in the culinary world, known for his unique recipes.
meanings.sent5: The coryphaeus of the music scene captivated audiences with her soulful performances.
